name: blender_farm
description: A fully fledged remote blender farm written in NodeJS
author: ScottishCyclops <scottlandart@gmail.com>

scripts.genkeys: openssl req -config ssl/blender.local.conf -new -sha256 -newkey rsa:2048 -nodes -keyout ssl/blender.local.key -x509 -days 365 -out ssl/blender.local.crt
